Name: Living Steel
Description:
The target's Melee Attacks gains +1 to hit and Magical Attacks.
No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Corruption of Tin
Description: The target suffers -1 Arm and gains Metal Armour.

Name: Wall of Lead
Description:
Place a Wall with dimensions 1x6" anywhere on the target.

Remove the Terrain Feature when the spell ends.

*As long as the target point is within Range, part of the Wall is allowed to be outside the Range of the spell.

Name: Molten Copper
Description: The target suffers D3+1 hits with AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks and Zeal (towards Metal Armour). These hits always wound on 4+.

Name: Word of Iron
Description: The target gains +2 Arm and  Metal Armour.

Name: Quicksilver Lash
Description: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks and Zeal (towards Metal Armour). These hits Always wound on 4+.

Name: Altered Sight
Description:
The target's Offensive Skill is modified by [α]. No model can be affected by more than one instance of each version of this spell simultaneously.

	Cosmos: [α]: +2

	Chaos: [α]: -2

Name: Truth of Time
Description:
The target's Charge Speed and Mobility are set to [α]. 

	Cosmos: [α]: 8"

	Chaos: [α]: 4"

Name: Weal and Woe
Description:
The target's Melee Attacks to wound rolls are modified by [α] and gain Magical Attacks.

	Cosmos: [α]: +1

	Chaos: [α]: -1

Name: Ice and Fire
Description:
The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4, AP0, and Magical Attacks. Successful [α] against wounds caused by this spell must be rerolled.

	Cosmos: [α]: Special Saves

	Chaos: [α]: Armour Saves

Name: Cosmic Scales
Description:
The target must reroll to-hit and Armour Save rolls of [α].

	Cosmos: [α]: 1

	Chaos: [α]: 6

Name: Thunder and Lightning
Description:
All hits are resolved with Str 6, AP 2, Lightning Attacks and Magical Attacks. The target suffers 3 hits. Before removing casualties, apply [α].

	Cosmos: [α]: The target suffers 1 additional hit

	Chaos: [α]: Select a new Unengaged enemy unit within 6″ of the target: it suffers 2 hits. Before removing casualties, select a 3rd Unengaged enemy unit within 6″ of the 2nd unit: it suffers 1 hit.

Name: Foresight
Description:
The target gains +2 Def and +2 Off.
No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Chance of Redemption
Description:
The target gains Divine Attacks.
In addition, it may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move.

Name: The Stars Align
Description: The target's Melee Attacks must reroll failed to-hit rolls.

Name: Fate's Judgement
Description: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP 1 and Magical Attacks. These hits are set to wound on 6+, and gain +1 to wound for each friendly Player Turn before the current one. (e.g. in your fourth Magic Phase, they wound on 3+).

Name: Augury of Despair
Description: The target suffers -1 Off and -1 Agi, both to a minimum of 1.

Name: Inescapable Doom
Description:
Immediately when the spell is cast and at the start of each of the Caster's subsequent Magic Phases, the target suffers 1 hit that wounds automatically with AP 10 and Magical Attacks.
No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Fountain of Youth
Description:
Choose one of the following effects for the target:

• The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises 1 HP.
• One model in the target Recovers 1 HP.

No Health Pool can Raise or Recover more than 1 HP per Magic Phase from this spell.

*Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6″ and be measured from a Field, Forest, Hill, Impassable Terrain, or Water Terrain Feature.

Name: Entwining Roots
Description:
The target suffers -2" Cha and -2" Mob, both to a minimum of 2", as well as -2 Agi, to a minimum of 1.

*Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6″ and be measured from a Forest.

Name: Veil of Mist
Description:
All units within 12″ of the target when Casting or Shooting suffer a -1 modifier to their Casting Rolls and a -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

*Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6″ and be measured from a Water Terrain Feature.

Name: Gravel Storm
Description:
The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with Str 3, AP 1, and Magical Attacks. If the target contains a Rank-and-File model with Light Troops, these hits are instead resolved with Str 4, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

*Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6″ and be measured from a Hill.

Name: Stone Skin
Description:
The target gains +1 Res. In addition, Melee Attacks allocated towards it never wound on better than 4+.

*Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6″ and be measured from an Impassable Terrain.

Name: Quicksand
Description:
The target suffers -1 to-hit with its Melee Attacks. The first time in each Player Turn that it performs a Move, each of its Health Pools must take a Dangerous Terrain (6+) Test.

*Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6″ and be measured from a Field.

Name: Whispers of the Veil
Description:
The target suffers -1 Res.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Danse Macabre
Description: The target gains Dying Blow and Ghost Step. In addition, it may immediately perform a  5" Magical Move.

Name: Chorus of the Damned
Description: The target gains Distracting (1) and Horror.

Name: Touch of the Reaper
Description: The target suffers D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, Magical Attacks and Psychic Attacks.

Name: Spectral Blades
Description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target are always at least Str 4, and always at least AP 4, and gain Magical Attacks.

Name: Soul Blight
Description: The target suffer 2D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, Magical Attacks and Psychic Attacks.

Name: The Devouring Dark
Description: The target suffers a hit with Area Attack (2×2), Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Hand of Glory
Description:
The target gains Aegis (6+) and Aegis (+1, max. 3+).

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Blood Curse
Description:
The target suffers -1 Str and -1 AP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Pentagram of Pain
Description:
The target suffers 3 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

If this spell causes at least one HP loss, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Umbral Majesty
Description:
Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell: that model part gains Grind Attack (5 hits, Str 5, AP 2, Unmodifiable).

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: The Grave Calls
Description:
The target suffers 8 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Fireball
Description: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

Name: Flaming Swords
Description: The target gains +1 to wound, Flaming Attacks (Melee & Shooting) and Magical Attacks (Melee & Shooting).

Name: Dragon's Roar
Description: Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Breath Attack (Str 4,  AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks) and Grind Attack (2D6, Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks and Unmodifiable).

Name: Pyroclastic Flow
Description: The target suffers 5D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

Name: Pillars of Fire
Description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target are always Str 4 and AP 0, and gain Automatic Hits, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

Name: Cage of Embers
Description:
Immediately when the spell is cast, the target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks. After the initial hits, the target gains Weakness (Flaming Attacks).

In addition, whenever the target moves, it suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

Name: Predator's Instinct
Description:
The target gains +2" Cha and Resistance (Ranged Attacks).

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Savage Fury
Description:
The target gains Fury, Fearless, Frenzy and Unruly.

In addition, the target can never be wounded on better than 3+.

Name: Awaken the Beast
Description: The target gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

Name: Swarm of Insects
Description:
Immediately when the spell is cast, the target suffers 5D6 hits with AP 0 and Magical Attacks, and that always wound on 6+.

In addition, it suffers -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

Name: Wild Spikes
Description: Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Grind Attack (4 hits, Str 6, AP 3, Unmodifiable)

Name: Totemic Summon
Description:
Summon a Totemic Beast (see model profile).

* Within 6″ of theTable Edge.

Name: Smite the Unbeliever
Description:
The target suffers D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

✠ : these hits are instead resolved with Str 7, AP 2, and Magical Attacks

x : These hits are instead resolved with Str 3, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Light of Faith
Description:
The target counts as having one fewer Proper Ranks when Engaged.

✠ : two fewer Proper Ranks instead

x : the spell has no effect

Name: Weight of Judgement
Description:
The target suffers -2 Agi, to a minimum of 1.

✠ : -3 Agi instead

x : -1 Agi instead

Name: Holy Affliction
Description:
The target suffers -1 to wound.

✠ : in addition, the target suffers -1 AP.

x : in addition, the target gains +1 AP

Name: Wrath of God
Description:
Place a marker on the target point. Do not roll for Divine Intervention when resolving the effects of this spell. You mustroll for Divine Intervention at the start of each subsequent Magic Phase:

✠ : each unit with in 2D6″ of the centre of the marker suffers 2D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks. Then remove the marker.

x : your opponent may move the marker up to 3″ in any direction.

Name: Rain of Fire
Description:
The target suffers D3+1 hits. All other units within 3" of the target suffer 1 hit. All hits are resolved with Str 9, AP 4, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

✠ : increase the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.

x : decrease the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.

Name: Evil Eye
Description:
The target suffers -1 Cha and -1 Mob (both to a minimum of 3), and -1 Agi (to a minimum of 1).

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Soured Luck
Description: Melee Attacks against the target are set to hit on at least 3+.

Name: Illusory Paths
Description:
Choose which effect to apply when casting the spell:

• The target gains Random Movement (2D6").

• The target gains Random Movement (3D6").

Name: Cauldron's Curse
Description: The target gains Weakness (Ranged Attacks).

Name: Clouded Sight
Description: The target cannot draw Line of Sight to a target more than 12" away from it.

Name: Mists of Invisibility
Description:
Mark the  point under the centre of the target, then remove the target from the Battlefield. At the start of your next friendly Movement Phase, place it back using Ambush (within 12″ of the marked point). 

* Cannot target Shaken units

Name: Arise!
Description:
Choose one of the following effects, for each target:

• The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.

• One model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.

The following models cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this sell each Magic Phase:

• Height 4-5 models with Solitary.

• Characters and models with WarPlatform.

Name: Astral Union
Description: The target gains Regeneration (6+) and Regeneration (+1, max. 3+).

Name: Breath of the Lady
Description: Add 2 Blessing Tokens to your pool.

Name: Breath of the Steppe
Description:
Place a round Tornado Marker with a 3" diameter with its centre on the target point. The Tornado Marker must be placed more than 1" away from any unit. The marker is considered Covering Terrain for units inside and/or behind them that contributes to ⟨Soft⟩ {Hard} Cover.

The Tornado Marker is Dangerous Terrain (2 {3}), even for models with Strider.

Name: Chains of Pride
Description: The target gains Unstable and Fearless. {Targets with Supernal cannot take Break Tests.}

Name: Children of Umi
Description: All Melee Attacks allocated against the target suffer -1 to wound.

Name: Curse of Nezibkesh
Description:
The target gains an Incendiary Marker. 

In addition, the target suffers -1 Def and -1 Off, and an additional -1 Def and -1 Off, as long as it has 1 or more Incendiary Markers on it.

Id: curse of the phantom queen/hereditary spells
Name: Curse of the Phantom Queen
Description:
Attacks made by the target suffer -1 AP.
Attacks made against the target gain +1 AP.
Attacks from spells are not affected.

Name: Duty is Eternal
Description: The target gains +1 Res.

Id: echoes of the dark forest/hereditary spells
Name: Echoes of the Dark Forest
Description:
The target gains Fearless.
In addition, it may immediately perform a 5″ Magical Move. This spell may target units in Ambush. If so, the target unit immediately enters the Battlefied following normal Ambush rules, instead of performing a Magical Move.

Name: Favour of Meladys
Description:
The target  gains 2 Protection Tokens which are removed when the spell ends. When a friendly unit within 18" of the target suffers a wound, after Armour Saves have been taken, but before any Special Saves are taken, the target may discard a Protection Token and ignore the wound applying the following rules:

• Rank-and-File models of Height 1 ignore up to 2 wounds per token (provided they are suffered simultaneously).

•  Characters, and models of Height 4 or 5, can each only ignore a single wound per Phase.

• Wounds from attacks with Multiple Wounds are not ignored, they inflict one less wound instead.

Name: Forest Embrace
Description:
Place a Forest * underneath the target until the last model in the unit is removed as a casualty. This Forest always extends up to the edges of the target's Unit Boundary (even if the unit moves or changes formation).

* You may place a marker next to the unit instead

Name: Frostbite
Description: If this spell targets a friendly unit, the target gains +1 Armour. If this spell targets an enemy unit, the target suffers -1 Armour. {This spell may target two units instead of one (declare the additional target before the Casting Attempt).}

Name: Guile and Fury
Description:
Can be cast in one of two versions:

• Augment: cannot be cast by a Goblin.

The target gains +1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are increased by 1".

• Hex: cannot be cast by an Orc.

The target suffers -1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1".

Name: Hellfire
Description:
The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 6, AP 0, and Magical Attacks.

* This spell can target units Engaged in Combat and in contact with the Caster's Front Facing.

Name: Spear of Infinity
Description: The target suffers 1 hit with Str 2, AP 2, Area Attack (1x5), Direct Hit (Str 4, AP 3, Multiple Wounds (2)), and Magical Attacks. The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Str for each spell successfully cast before this spell in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

Id: tempest of the storm witch/hereditary spells
Name: Tempest of the Storm Witch
Description: The target may immediately perform a 12" Magical Move and loses Scoring. {In addition, the target gains Coastal Predator.}

Name: Aura of Power
Description:
The model can cast its chosen spell as a Bound Spell. Must choose one spell:

 • The Stars Align: The target's Melee Attacks must reroll failed to-hit rolls.

 • Ice and Fire: The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4, AP 0, and Magical Attacks. Successful [α] against wounds caused by this spell must be rerolled.

	Cosmo: [α] : Special Saves
	Chaos:  [β] : Armour Saves.

Name: Book of the Dead
Description:
The bearer can cast a unique Bound Spell: Unfinished Duty.

Choose one of the following effects for each target:

 • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises a number of HP equal to its Resurrected value.

 • One model in the target Recovers a number of HP equal to its Resurrected value.

Name: Carved Wisdom - Molten Copper
Description:
The model can cast Molten Copper (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers D3+1 hits with AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, and Zeal (towards Metal Armour). These hits always wound on 4+.

Name: Carved Wisdom - Fate's Judgement
Description:
The model can cast Fate's Judgement (Divination) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP1 and Magical Attacks. These hits are set to wound on 6+, and gain +1 to wound for each friendly Player Turn before the current one (e.g. in your fourth Magic Phase, they wound on 3+).

Id: carved wisdom - touch of the reaper/bound spells
Name: Carved Wisdom - Touch of the Reaper
Description:
The model can cast Touch of the Reaper (Evocation) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, Magical Attacks and Psychic Attacks.

Id: carved wisdom - swarm of insects/bound spells
Name: Carved Wisdom - Swarm of Insects
Description:
The model can cast Swarm of Insects (Shamanism) as a Bound Spell.

Immediately when the spell is cast, the target suffers 5D6 hits with AP 0 and Magical Attacks, and that always wound on 6+.

In addition, it suffers -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

Name: Ceinran's Scales
Description:
The bearer can cast Whispers of the Veil (Evocation) as a BoundSpell.

The target suffers -1 Res. No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Dark Prelate - Blood Curse
Description:
The bearer can cast Blood Curse (Occultism) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers -1 Str and -1 AP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Id: dark prelate - pentagram of pain/bound spells
Name: Dark Prelate - Pentagram of Pain
Description:
The bearer can cast Pentagram of Pain (Occultism) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 3 hits with Str 5, AP2, and Magical Attacks. If this spell causes at least one HP loss, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Dengrai's Ice Storm
Description:
The model can cast Clouded Sight (Witchcraft) as a Bound Spell.

The target cannot draw Line of Sight to a target more than 12″ away from it.

Name: Exemplar's Flame
Description:
The bearer can cast Corruption of Tin (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers -1 Arm and gains Metal Armour.

Name: Firebrand
Description:
The model can cast Fireball (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

Name: Firestarter - Spear of Infinity
Description:
The target suffers 1 hit with Str 2 [5], AP 2, Area Attack (1x5), and [Multiple Wounds (2)].
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Str for each other non-Attribute Spell successfully cast in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

Name: Firestarter - Smite the Unbeliever
Description:
The target suffers D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

✠: These hits are instead resolved with Str 7, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

x: These hits are instead resolved with Str 3, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Golden Idol of Shamut
Description:
The bearer can cast Flaming Swords (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell.

The target gains +1 to wound, Flaming Attacks (Melee & Shooting) and Magical Attacks (Melee & Shooting)

Name: Holy Relic
Description:
The model can cast Fate's Judgement (Divination) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP 1 and Magical Attacks. These hits are set to wound on 6+, and gain  +1 to wound for each friendly Player Turn before the current one. E.g. in your fourth Magic Phase, it wounds on 3+.

The bearer can cast Hellfire (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 6, AP 0, and Magical Attacks.

*This spell can target units Engaged in Combat and in contact with the Caster’s Front Facing.

Name: Kherp Sceptre
Description:
The wielder can cast Danse Macabre (Evocation) as a Bound Spell.

The target gains Dying Blow and Ghost Step.
In addition, it may immediately perform a 5″ Magical Move.

Name: Lash of Souls
Description:
The model can cast Pentagram of Pain (Occultism) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 3 hits with Str 5, AP2, and MagicalAttacks. If this spell causes at least one HP loss, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Monster Munch
Description:
The bearer can cast Totemic Summon (Shamanism) as a BoundSpell.

 Summon a Totemic Beast

Name: Necromantic Staff
Description:
The wielder gains Channel (1), and can cast Arise! (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell, with the following above changes. Choose one of the following effects, for each target:

 • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.
 • One model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.

The following models can not Recover more than 2 HP from this spell each Magic Phase:

 • Height 4-5 models with Solitary.
 • Characters and models with WarPlatform.

Name: Relic Shroud
Description:
The bearer can cast Breath of the Lady (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell.

Add 2 Blessing Tokens to your pool.

Name: Rod of Battle
Description:
The bearer can cast Living Steel (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell.

The target's Melee Attacks gains +1 to hit and Magical Attacks. No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Soul Tether
Description:
The wielder gains Channel (1), and can cast Arise! (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell, with above changes.

Choose one of the following effects, for each target:

 • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.
 • One model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.

The following models can not Recover more than 2 HP from this spell each Magic Phase:

 • Height 4-5 models with Solitary.
 • Characters and models with WarPlatform.

Name: Surge of Mad Spirits
Description:
Ashotet can cast a unique Bound Spell.

The target must take a Courage Test rolling an additional D6. If failed, it suffers a number of hits equal to the amount by which the test was failed. Those hits wound automatically and have AP 10.

Id: symbol of the warborn alliance/bound spells
Name: Symbol of the Warborn Alliance
Description:
The model can cast Guile and Fury (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell. Each time the model attempts to cast that Bound Spell, the owner may freely choose which version to cast. Can be cast in one of two versions:

Augment: cannot be cast by Goblin.
The target gains +1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are increased by 1″.

Hex: cannot be cast by Orc.
The target suffers −1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1″.

Name: The Dead Arise
Description:
The model can cast The Dead Arise as a Bound Spell.

Summon a Skeletons or Zombies unit. Declare which when selecting the target. The unit has a number of Health Points corresponding to its Rsr. All upgrades except Command Group Options are allowed.

Note: all models must be placed within the spell's Range, with at least one model touching the target point.

Name: Gnarled Hide Totem
Description: The target gains +1 Arm and Distracting (1).

Name: Blooded Horn Totem
Description: The target gains +1 Att and +2 AP.

Name: Clouded Eye Totem
Description: The target gains Hard Target (1) and Magic Resistance (3).

Name: Black Wing Totem
Description: The target gains +2" Cha and +3 Agi.

Id: rune of r e vocation/dh - battle runes
Name: Rune of R e vocation
Description:
Ignore all other spell effects on the target from spells with Duration: One Turn.
The target unit gains Magic Resistance (2), which is also applied to friendly spells.

Id: rune of r e ckoning/dh - battle runes
Name: Rune of R e ckoning
Description:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Hatred.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Hatred.

Name: Rune of Oaths
Description:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Zeal.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Zeal.

Id: rune of r e s olve/dh - battle runes
Name: Rune of R e s olve
Description:
The target gains Swiftstride, and until the end of the Player Turn it also gains Light Troops.
In addition, the target may immediately perform a 4" Magical Move

Name: Rune of Gleaming
Description: The target gains Distracting (1) and Hard Target (1).

Id: rune of r e s ilience/dh - battle runes
Name: Rune of R e s ilience
Description: To-wound rolls against the target suffer a -1 modifier.

Name: Brace for Impact!
Description: The target gains Fight in Extra Rank

Name: On The Double!
Description: The target gains +1″ Cha and +2″ Mob.

Name: Ready! Aim! Fire!
Description: The target gains Accurate

Name: Steady, Men!
Description: The target gains Disciplined, and its Courage Tests gain Minimised

Name: Ullor's Blessing
Description: The target gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks).

Name: Sunna's Blessing
Description: The target's unit gains Flaming Attacks. Each enemy unit in contact with the target's unit when the spell is cast, suffers D6 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

Name: Volund's Blessing
Description: The target's unit gains Zeal.

Id: orison of s h ielding/koe - blessing tokens
Name: Orison of S h ielding
Description: The target gains Aegis (5+).

Id: orison of s t riking/koe - blessing tokens
Name: Orison of S t riking
Description: The target gains +2 Off, Magical Attacks, and ignore Parry. Model parts with Mount are not affected.

Name: Orison of Discipline
Description: The target's Discipline is set to 9.

Id: dance of bedevilments/se - dances of cenyrn
Name: Dance of Bedevilments
Description: Unit gains Afflict (-1 Dis), and enemy units in contact can not claim Combat Score bonus from their Proper Ranks.

Id: dance of biting wind/se - dances of cenyrn
Name: Dance of Biting Wind
Description: Unit gains +1 AP and Lethal Strike.

Id: dance of the parting mists/se - dances of cenyrn
Name: Dance of the Parting Mists
Description: Unit gains -1 Str, -1 AP, and Aegis (3+).

Id: dance of whirling blades/se - dances of cenyrn
Name: Dance of Whirling Blades
Description: Unit gains +1 Att.
